successes.title: PicoBrew Zymatic:  Automatic Beer Brewing Appliance
successes.description: Brew award-winning craft beer at the touch of a button!

Pledges.description: VIRTUAL TIP O' THE GLASS:  We're excited to have you as a supporter and will list you on our Supporters List on www.picobrew.com!
PICOBREW LOGO T-SHIRT:  Show your colors as a vanguard member of the PicoBrewing revolution!  (Includes USA Shipping. International Shipping additional)
ARTIST-SERIES PICOBREW T-SHIRT:  Choose from our 3 Artist-Series PicoBrew T's.   Show your support in style!   (Includes USA Shipping.  International Shipping additional)
PICOBREW TASTER SET:   1 PicoBrew Logo Growler + tasting glasses on a tasting paddle.  Share your PicoBrews with friends!   (Includes USA Shipping.  International Shipping additional)

PILOT PICOBREWERY:  Be part of a very exclusive club!   You'll be the first on your block to have a complete PicoBrew Zymatic(tm) setup including a new 5G keg, and ingredients for your first recipe.  (Taxes and Shipping additional)

2ND PILOT PRODUCTION RUN:   You'll still be one of the first to have a complete PicoBrew Zymatic(tm) setup including a new 5G keg, and ingredients for your first recipe.  (Taxes and Shipping additional)
FIRST PRODUCTION:  Be one of the first to get a PicoBrew Zymatic(tm) production unit!
(US and Canada, Taxes and Shipping additional)
SECOND PRODUCTION:  Get yourself a PicoBrew Zymatic(tm) before general availability from our website begins!
(US and Canada, Tax and shipping additional)

INTERNATIONAL PICOBREW:  You asked for it, you got it!   Be the first outside of the US and Canada to experience PicoBrewing with our first international PicoBrew Zymatic(tm) release, available in your choice of 110 and 220v.  (Outside of US and Canada only, Shipping paid separately, meeting of import regulations, payment of import duties and taxes are assumed by the buyer)
